author: fhanik
msg: Add in handling of async supported for filters during regular invokation and a dispatch

author: veithen
msg: We explicitly allow creation of a StAXOMWrapper from a parser in state START_ELEMENT. This means that we must check the state of the parser before calling getVersion or isStandalone, since these methods are allowed by the StAX specs only in state START_DOCUMENT. This solves an issue with XLXP.

author: gertv
msg: FELIX-1450: Karaf branding and plugins for Felix webconsole
